item.title: 中文
item.description: $$a^2=b^2+c^2$$ #739 https://github.com/octo-org/octo-repo/issues/740 Add delight to the experience when all tasks are complete :tada: (Optional) Open a followup issue #739 https://github.com/octo-org/octo-repo/issues/740 Add delight to the experience when all tasks are complete :tada: (Optional) Open a followup issue- #739 https://github.com/octo-org/octo-repo/issues/740 Add delight to the experience when all tasks are complete :tada: H1 int main() { return 0; } You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more.
